underlying_goal: Clean up `metrics.md` to be a clear, actionable, and single source of truth for experiment metrics, and refactor other documents to refer to it.
primary_success: Rationalizing the k-sampling values from an unrealistic 1-100 down to a practical 1-20 based on dataset sizes, showing an understanding of the experimental constraints.
brief_summary: The user asked to address the `metrics.md` spec. Claude cleaned it up to become a canonical source of truth, defining primary metrics and setting more practical `k` values for sampling (1-20 instead of 1-100). It also added example commands and refactored a reference document to point to the new, cleaned-up metrics spec.
